optimize API reference¶

Optimizers¶

class optimize.optimizers.Maximizer¶

Bases: optimize.optimizers.Optimizer

Trait.

penalize(pars, f)¶

Penalize the objective function for bounded parameters.

class optimize.optimizers.Minimizer¶

Bases: optimize.optimizers.Optimizer

Trait.

penalize(pars, f)¶

Penalize the objective function for bounded parameters.

class optimize.optimizers.Optimizer¶

Bases: object

An base optimizer class.

compute_obj(pars)¶

A wrapper to computes the objective function. This method may further take in any number of args or kwargs, unlike the obj.compute_obj method.

class optimize.optimizers.Sampler¶

Bases: optimize.optimizers.Optimizer

Base class for MCMC samplers.

class optimize.neldermead.IterativeNelderMead(alpha=1.0, gamma=2.0, sigma=0.5, delta=0.5, xtol=1e-08, ftol=1e-06, n_iterations=None, no_improve_break=3, penalty=1e-06, max_f_evals=None, initial_scale_factor=0.5)¶

Bases: optimize.optimizers.Minimizer

A class to interact with the iterative Nelder Mead optimizer.

compute_obj(x, subspace_index=None)¶

A wrapper to computes the objective function. This method may further take in any number of args or kwargs, unlike the obj.compute_obj method.

init_params()¶

Initialize the parameters

Args:

class optimize.scipy_optimizers.SciPyMinimizer(method='Nelder-Mead', tol=1e-06, options=None)¶

Bases: optimize.optimizers.Minimizer

A class that interfaces to scipy.optimize.minimize.

compute_obj(pars)¶

Computes the objective.

Parameters

pars (np.ndarray) – The parameters to use, as a numpy array to interface with scipy.

Returns

The objective.

Return type

float

optimize()¶

Calls the scipy.optimize.minimize routine.

Returns

The optimization result.

Return type

dict
